name: Pixalor The Sacred Church
description:
A short game for a 24 hour limit RPG Game Jam made in RPG Maker

Edit : I fixed the Settings/Options now and turns out that the game didn't read the Scripts correctly and had to be redone Manually so that's solved :)

In Pixalor you play as a military expedition on an investigation of mysterious occurrences in a small abandoned village that may involving heresy & occultism.However, things didn't go well as it seems once you have arrived only to be greeted by dead bodies & howling undead
